name: Color Dream No.246
summary:
International Conference on Computer Graphics and Interactive Techniques archive 
　　ACM SIGGRAPH 2006 Computer animation festival 
　　Michael Theodore 's "Color Dream no.246" is "as pure a piece of abstract animation as you'll find, consisting entirely of one long shot of undulating, scintillating, shifting washes of color."
